LanguageData.AC_DragonianSteakBuff.label: Dragonian Steak Effect
LanguageData.AC_DragonianSteakBuff.description: After eating Dragonian Steak, ranged abilities decrease, but defense is increased.
LanguageData.AC_SpicyRabbitHeadBuff.label: Spicy Rabbit Effect
LanguageData.AC_SpicyRabbitHeadBuff.description: After eating Spicy Rabbit, your mindset becomes clearer.
LanguageData.AC_GrilledMoeLotlBuff.label: Grilled MoeLotl Effect
LanguageData.AC_GrilledMoeLotlBuff.description: After eating Grilled MoeLotl, your body becomes more energetic.
LanguageData.AC_MiliraStewBuff.label: Milira Stew Effect
LanguageData.AC_MiliraStewBuff.description: After eating Milira Stew, your thoughts become broader.
LanguageData.AC_CarroxBuff.label: Fox Radish Effect
LanguageData.AC_CarroxBuff.description: After consuming the Fox Radish, your psychic insight has deepened.
LanguageData.AC_MaruCheeseBuff.label: Maru Cheese Effect
LanguageData.AC_MaruCheeseBuff.description: After consuming the Maru Cheese, you temporarily gain the power of the Maru tribe.
LanguageData.AC_KiiroNoodlesBuff.label: Kiiro Instant Noodles Effect
LanguageData.AC_KiiroNoodlesBuff.description: After eating Kiiro instant noodles, the quality of life will improve.
LanguageData.AC_MoyoSyrupBuff.label: Moyo Syrup Effect
LanguageData.AC_MoyoSyrupBuff.description: After consuming Moyo Syrup, immunity will be enhanced.
LanguageData.AC_ViViCakeBuff.label: ViVi Cake Effect
LanguageData.AC_ViViCakeBuff.description: After consuming the ViVi Cake, work efficiency will increase.
LanguageData.AC_AntySauceBuff.label: Anty Sauce Effect
LanguageData.AC_AntySauceBuff.description: After consuming Anty Sauce, heat resistance will temporarily improve, and carrying capacity will increase.
LanguageData.AC_SweetAndSourKurinBuff.label: Sweet and Sour Kurin Effect
LanguageData.AC_SweetAndSourKurinBuff.description: After consuming Sweet and Sour Kurin, social abilities will improve.
LanguageData.AC_MooseAntlerRoastBuff.label: Moose Antler Roast Effect
LanguageData.AC_MooseAntlerRoastBuff.description: After consuming the Moose Antler Roast, your brute strength will become more effective.
LanguageData.AC_LalafellRoastRiceBowlBuff.label: Lalafell Roast Meat Rice Bowl Effect
LanguageData.AC_LalafellRoastRiceBowlBuff.description: After eating the Lalafell Roast Meat Rice Bowl, your appetite will become more vigorous.
LanguageData.AC_YeLongRouWanBuff.label: YeLong Meatball Effect
LanguageData.AC_YeLongRouWanBuff.description: After eating YeLong meatballs, the body becomes light, senses sharpened, almost as if one can foresee danger.
LanguageData.AC_KnowledgeBreadBuff.label: Knowledge Bread Effect
LanguageData.AC_KnowledgeBreadBuff.description: After eating Knowledge Bread, the mind seems to be filled with knowledge.
LanguageData.AC_LongHuDouBuff.label: Dragon-Tiger Fight
LanguageData.AC_LongHuDouBuff.description: After consuming Dragon-Tiger Fight, you will experience the spiritual power of the dragon and the tiger.
LanguageData.AC_LongFengBuff.label: Dragon and Phoenix Presenting Auspice
LanguageData.AC_LongFengBuff.description: After consuming Dragon and Phoenix Presenting Auspice, you will receive the blessings of Chinese auspiciousness.
LanguageData.AC_WhiteCutChickBuff.label: White Cut Chicken
LanguageData.AC_WhiteCutChickBuff.description: After consuming White Cut Chicken, you will become more knowledgeable and learned.
